thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Facebook to show 25 Major League Baseball games this season

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Facebook to show 25 Major League Baseball games this season
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Facebook Inc said it has signed a deal with Major League Baseball (MLB) to stream 25 games this season on the social network.
MLB Network would produce the game on behalf of Facebook and also distribute specially curated content in addition to each live game broadcast.
Facebook had tied up with MLB last year to show 20 of the leagueâ€™s games live.
The first broadcast is the match between National League East rivals, the Philadelphia Phillies and New York Mets on April 4. (Reporting by Supantha Mukherjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Shounak Dasgupta)
